question: Sathar, who passed away recently, was the renowned actor of which regional cinema?
explanation: Veteran Malayalam actor Sathar (67), who was known for his character roles in films, has passed away at Aluva on 17th September 2019.Â  He has over 300 movies to his credit, including Tamil and Telugu films. At the height of his acting career, Sathar married his popular co-star Jayabharathy in 1979 though they got separated later. Their son Krish Sathar is also an actor besides running his own business in London.
